post:
Introducing our new KVM VPS packages

You're searching for a KVM vps but you prefer OpenVZ prices? Then, take a look to our packages! :)

We're proud to offer these packages to you guys on LET!

Please keep in mind that we are humans like you guys, and our main value is the satisfaction of our customers, so if you need a custom configuration we'll be glad to take some time to fit your needs :)


***INCLUDING AN EXCLUSIVE PROMOTION CODE FOR LET COMMUNITY!***
  
With the latest SolusVM version. Automated provisioning on each VPS package!
  
Install most of the latest distributions available! 32 AND 64 bits of course…
  
- CentOS 5/6
- Debian 5/6/7
- Fedora 17
- Scientific Linux 5/6
- Ubuntu 12.10/13.04

If you need other OS or provide your own iso/image, we'll be glad to give you access to it in your SolusVM account but please contact us at service [at] nixcom [dot] ca before ordering.
  
**_THIS IS BASED ON KVM VIRTUALIZATION_**
  
_**TEST IP:**_ 199.48.164.42
 
_LOCATED IN FLORIDA, USA_
  
For speed test, please contact us: support [at] nixcom [dot] ca
  
- 1x **2.26** INTEL CPU
- 20 Gb HDD RAID PROTECTED
- 1000 Gb Bandwidth @ 100 Mbit
- 256 Mb RAM & 512 Mb SWAP
- 1 IP address
- Web Panel access (SolusVM)
- FREE INSTANT SETUP
 
PRICE: $3.99/month

_**If you want to upgrade, feel free to open a ticket to our support departement and we'll be glad to apply 15% off on upgrades too!**_
 
[TO ORDER](https://cspanel.nixcom.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=21)
